mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MYMONEY (MYMONEY.MEMBERID) SELECT B.MEMBERID FROM MYMONEY RIGHT JOIN MEMBER B ON MYMONEY.MEMBERID =B.MEMBERID WHERE MYMONEY.MEMBERID IS NULL AND B.MEMBERID=#{memberid};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER INNER JOIN MYMONEY ON MEMBER.MEMBERID =MYMONEY.MEMBERID WHERE MEMBER.MEMBERID = #{memberid};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POINTINFO VALUES( NULL, #{memberid}, #{bankname}, #{accountnumber},#{accountholder},#{withdrawpoint},"접수", NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT MAKECHALLENGE.CHALLENGENO, MAKECHALLENGE.CHALLENGETITLE, MAKECHALLENGE.CHALLENGESTARTDATE, MAKECHALLENGE.CHALLENGEENDDATE,MAKECHALLENGE.THUMBNAILPATH, MAKECHALLENGE.ONOFFCHOICE FROM MAKECHALLENGE INNER JOIN PAYMENT on PAYMENT.CHALLENGENO=MAKECHALLENGE.CHALLENGENO WHERE PAYMENT.MEMBERID = #{memberid};
